If you're looking for something a bit more grounded in reality, I'd recommend "The Wrestler". Mickey Rourke gives a critically-acclaimed performance as a worn-out wrestler trying to make a comeback, and Marisa Tomei shines alongside him as a charming stripper. It's a gritty and poignant portrayal of the human condition that's hard to forget.
